name: cashu-for-woocommerce
description: Cashu For WooCommerce adds a secure Cashu payment gateway to your WooCommerce store
author: Rob Woodgate

scripts.lint:check: npm run lint:php:check && npm run lint:css:check
scripts.lint: npm run lint:php && npm run lint:css
scripts.build: vite build && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run lint:check && npm run start
scripts.check: npm run format:check && npm run lint:check && npm test
scripts.fix: npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.wp-env:seed-store: wp-env run cli wp plugin install wordpress-importer --activate && wp-env run cli wp import wp-content/plugins/woocommerce/sample-data/sample_products.xml --authors=create
